ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 28 Feb 2000, Daniel P. Sniderman wrote:
> > From: Jeremy Mueller<jmueller@...>
> >
> > If you have your mouse control enabled, then you can hold down the right
> > mouse button to move the view.
>
> Actually - no. This does NOT work in the Locate+Bind Sight which is the
> whole point of this thread.

Hmm, worked for me, although only in external views #3 and #4
(the two just before you switch back to first-person view).
If the corpse is some distance away, the view can get "stuck"
in a certain direction, which I think is a bug with the bind
sight song when the target is outside the range your client is
normally getting info for.
